title: How to fix Google Pixel 2XL Powering OFF whenever I plug in charger or type-c ear-piece?
content: My Google Pixel 2XL do shutdown automatically whenever I plug in charger or ear-piece. I have tried other power source like Power Bank, even PC, clean every debris and do every thing I think might be the cause but still do OFF every time I plug in to the device type-c port. Please i need a solution to this soonest because I'm completely fed up.
